alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana and southwestern Warren Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mound, or 8 miles east of Tallulah, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mound around 410 PM CDT. Vicksburg and Le Tourneau around 450 PM CDT. Yokena around 455 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Delta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
